channel.title: Sorry im posting a lot -.- but please help?
channel.description: ok so i searched on google how to make a automatic voting system where u can do ::vote then once u vote u can do ::claim but it doesnt show up so how can i make these commands or idk how to say it sorry :\ thanks :(

item.description:

item.title: Sorry im posting a lot -.- but please help?
item.dc:creator: @T_h_3 T h 3
item.description:
@T_h_3 wrote:

[quote=“B0SS, post:1, topic:471217”]ok so i searched on google how to make a automatic voting system where u can do ::vote then once u vote u can do ::claim but it doesnt show up so how can i make these commands or idk how to say it sorry :
thanks :([/quote]

Make sure you change the vote command in your client.java client sided, and NOT your commands.java file server sided.

Read full topic
